title: Visual Psychology-Informed Fashion Design Methodology: Theory and Empirical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Design Principles and General Understanding of Visual Perception Processes
context.additional_context: Modular content design and case-based learning enhancement to enable efficient mobile learning for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply principles of visual psychology (e.g., shape perception, color contrast) to fashion design elements.
Learners can evaluate design effectiveness through empirical validation methods (e.g., A/B testing, user feedback analysis).
Learners can visualize design concepts using interactive simulation tools in a mobile learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
